attributes.action: Grant UK citizenship to anyone with Indefinite Leave to Remain or Settled Status
attributes.additional_details: We are asking the Government to introduce legislation which grants UK citizenship to all people who currently hold ILR or settled status who want citizenship, to ensure people do not need to go through what can be a long and expensive procedure.
attributes.background: Some political parties are proposing deportation or a change of rights to people with ILR or settled status. Millions of people could be affected.
